mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order_info (ono, pno, id, o_category, o_title, o_name, o_brand_name, o_size, o_img_1, o_amount, o_price, o_mileage_gain, o_final_price) values(#{ono}, #{pno}, #{id}, #{o_category},#{o_title}, #{o_name}, #{o_brand_name}, #{o_size},#{o_img_1}, #{o_amount}, #{o_price}, #{o_mileage_gain}, #{o_final_price})
mapper.select: update tbl_order_info set u_name = #{u_name}, u_addr1= #{u_addr1}, u_addr2 = #{u_addr2}, u_phone = #{u_phone}, count = #{count} where ono = #{ono}
